entry.content:

Plamo

달롱이의 건플라 리뷰

http://gundam.wikia.com/wiki/Master_Grade
http://gundam.wikia.com/wiki/Real_Grade
http://gundam.wikia.com/wiki/Perfect_Grade

RG(1/144) ガンプラ他 通販
HG HGUC etc. (1/144) Gundam Kit/etc. Store

RG［リアルグレード］｜ガンプラ｜バンダイ ホビーサイト
HG UNIVERSAL CENTURY｜ガンプラ｜バンダイ ホビーサイト
HG［ハイグレード］｜ガンプラ｜バンダイ ホビーサイト

GUNPLA｜RG (REAL GRADE)｜PREMIUM BANDAI
[HG (HIGH GRADE)｜PREMIUM BANDAI 香港(http://p-bandai.hk/hobby/a0001/b0003/list-da10-n0/)

Owned

RB-79K Ball The 08MS Ver. (MG) (Gundam Model Kits)
RX-78-02 Gundam (GUNDAM THE ORIGIN Ver.) (MG) (Gundam Model Kits)

RX-78-2 Gundam (RG) (Gundam Model Kits)
MS-06S Char`s Zaku (RG) (Gundam Model Kits)
RX-78 GP01 Gundam GP01 Zephyranthes (RG) (Gundam Model Kits)
MBF-P02 Gundam Astray Red Frame (RG) (Gundam Model Kits)
RX-178 Gundam MK-II (A.E.U.G.) (RG) (Gundam Model Kits)

Gundam Operation V Set (HGUC) (Gundam Model Kits)
Gyan (HGUC) (Gundam Model Kits)
Gouf (HGUC) (Gundam Model Kits)
Zaku I (Char Aznable`s) (HG) (Gundam Model Kits)
MS-06 Zaku II Mass Production Type (HGUC) (Gundam Model Kits)
MS-09 Dom / MS-09R Rick-Dom (HGUC) (Gundam Model Kits)
RGM-79FP Gm Striker (HGUC) (Gundam Model Kits)
RX-78 GP02A Gundam GP02 PHYSALIS (HGUC) (Gundam Model Kits)

Tutorial

http://bandai-hobby.net/site/comic_tsukurou.html
http://bandai-hobby.net/en/beginnersguide_tips.html
Gundam Model Beginner’s Guide for B uilding Amazing Kits | FROM JAPAN Blog
齊來砌模型! (香港中文字幕版) - YouTube

水口

  • use #400-#600 sand paper for primary processing
  • apply #1000-#1500 IN ONE DIRECTION, DO NOT CIRCLE
  • apply #2000 for polishing

Panel lines

Gundam Panel Lining: Gunpla’s Guide to Markers and Paints | FROM JAPAN Blog Markers vs Panel Wash
Tutorial: Panel Lines - YouTube

Black is for general use and dark parts; Grey for white parts; Dark Brown for red parts; Brown is for yellow parts
Note oil base methods will dilute your paints so apply lacquer coating before panel lining

  1. pen
    The ink can be water or oil base the former is easier to cleanup; the tip can be hard or soft (a brush)
    Acutally we can use what we found in stationary stores for panel lining
    It’s better to use 0.10mm or 0.05mm panel line pens for 1/144 models
    There are several alternative for hard tip pens:
  • 郡士’s GM01-03 0.3mm (also marketed as Gundam markers) (oil base)
  • Sakura Micron 0.20mm and 0.05mm (water base)
  • Potentate 0.05mm (water base)
    Sakura and Potentate take a bit more time to dry compared with GM0X
    郡士 also has a water base brush GM20-21 series
  1. water base marker
    Use the small end of GM40X series on the panel lines and wipe off the excess
  2. panel wash
    Panel wash work best on plastic kit, it take advantage of capillary effect
    All we need to is highly diluted enamel paint, dip on the panel lines and physics will do the rest
    The tip of 郡士’s GM301-303 is larger than TAMIYA’s panel line accent color, making it harder to work on complex and small kits
    TAMIYA’s panel line accent color is the traditional panel wash technique packaged in a bottle, it saves you the need for paint diluting and brush washing
entry.summary: Gundam Month: The History of Gundam - YouTube

entry.title: systemd
entry.content:
systemd - Wikiwand
systemd - freedesktop.org
systemd - ArchWiki
systemd - Debian Wiki
TipsAndTricks

Meet systemd, the controversial project taking over a Linux distro near you | PCWorld
How To Use Systemctl to Manage Systemd Services and Units | DigitalOcean
Systemd Essentials: Working with Services, Units, and the Journal | DigitalOcean

System services are written in .service files, located in:
/usr/lib/systemd/system (enabled) and /usr/lib/systemd/system/ (available).

This is what systemctl enable teamviewerd does:

/etc/systemd/system/display-manager.service symlinks to the DM (or plymouth wrapper).

Archlinux, systemd-free

Running Node.js on Linux with systemd - via @codeship | via @codeship

Docker service example:

systemctl

systemctl - List active services in system

systemctl --all - List all services in system

systemctl start SERVICE.service - Use it to start a service. Does not persist after reboot

systemctl stop SERVICE.service - Use it to stop a service. Does not persist after reboot

systemctl restart SERVICE.service - Use it to restart a service

systemctl reload SERVICE.service - If the service supports it, it will reload the config files related to it without interrupting any process that is using the service.

systemctl status SERVICE.service - Shows the status of a serviceTells whether a service is currently running.

systemctl enable SERVICE.service - Turns the service on, on the next reboot or on the next start event. It persists after reboot.

systemctl disable SERVICE.service - Turns the service off on the next reboot or on the next stop event. It persists after reboot.

systemctl is-enabled SERVICE.service - Check if a service is currently configured to start or not on the next reboot.

systemctl is-active SERVICE.service - Check if a service is currently active.

systemctl show SERVICE.service - Show all the information about the service.

Lennart Poettering

Why systemd?
The Biggest Myths
systemd journal

systemd for Developers

systemd for Developers I
systemd for Developers II
systemd for Developers III

systemd for Administrators

TODO:
http://0pointer.net/blog/archives.html
select “systemd for Administrators” and generate links

systemd for Administrators, Part II
systemd for Administrators, Part III

entry.title: Computer Graphics
entry.content:
GPU Hierarchy - Comparison of Graphics Cards for Gaming
How Rendering Graphics Works in Games! - YouTube

RAM of GPU matters the most on high texture and output resolution.

ICTGraphicsLab - YouTube

History

A Brief History of Graphics - YouTube
The 30 Year History of AMD Graphics, In Pictures
The History Of Nvidia GPUs

Antialiasing

Anti-aliasing - Wikiwand
Spatial anti-aliasing - Wikiwand
TweakGuides.com - Crysis 3 Tweak Guide

FXAA does AA on full screen post-processing and may introduce blurriness
SMAA based on MLAA post-processing and may add temporal AA to the mix (which causes shadows for slow moving objects)
MSAA is the traditional approach but takes more resources
SSAA super sample AA

API

see khronos-group.md
see khronos-group.md#vulkan

The next gen API all focus on exposing the low level GPU hardware to software developer.

Reaching Console Performance: Shader Intrinsic Functions | techPowerUp
WTF is going on with DX12 and Vulkan? - YouTube
Does DirectX 12 Suck? - YouTube

WTF is going on with SLI? - YouTube
Adapters are linked if they are close to the same hardware, unlinked otherwise.
Implicit Mode (linked implicitly) (IMA, Implicit Multiadaptor) is SLI/Crossfire.
Explicit Modes (EMA, Explicit Multiadaptor) can work on linked and unlinked hardware.

DX12

Exclusive: The Nvidia and AMD DirectX 12 Editorial - Complete DX12 Graphic Card List with Specifications, Asynchronous Shaders and Hardware Features Explained !important
DirectX 12 tested: An early win for AMD and disappointment for Nvidia | Ars Technica
Multi-GPU DirectX 12 shootouts show AMD with performance lead over Nvidia | Ars Technica
Direct3D 12 Glossary (Windows)

Asynchronous compute shaders in DX12 benefits the most when CPU is the bottleneck

Mantle Graphics API | AMD

Gaming: One of Mantle’s Futures: Vulkan | Community Chronos Group has chosen the best and brightest parts of Mantle to serve as the foundation for “Vulkan”
Gaming: On APIs and the future of Mantle | Community AMD recommends DX12 or Vulcan
Mantle is a Vulkan: AMD’s dead graphics API rises from the ashes in OpenGL’s successor | PCWorld
AMD’s Mantle 1.0 is dead; long live DirectX | PCWorld

entry.title: Toxics
entry.content:
Paracelsus, a 16th-century alchemist, and physician coined a great phrase: “All things are poison and nothing is without poison; only the dose makes a thing not a poison.”

Poisons

Arsenic Poisoning - A History | Curious Minds - Curious Minds Podcast
Arsenic 砒霜, compete with phosphorus in the chemical reaction that produces ATP
used excessively to kill people before the 19th century, until the Marsh Test which can identify minute traces of it in corpses was invented in 1830’s.

Cyanide 山埃

Drugs

LSD History | Curious Minds - Curious Minds Podcast
LSD History, Pt.2: Timothy Leary | Curious Minds - Curious Minds Podcast
LSD is not addictive, and is one of the strongest drugs known to man
the common dose is a mere 50ug
comparing to that of cocaine 100mg

entry.title: Chinese Swords
entry.content:
中國名劍

中國名劍 - Wikiwand
名劍 - Google Search

春秋戰國正值青銅時期，鑄劍祖師歐冶子在其時冶鑄出的鐵劍即為當代寶劍。

曠古名劍–中國古代十大名劍排名 - BuzzHand

歐冶子冶鑄出了第一把鐵劍：「龍淵」，開創了中國冷兵器之先河。
歐冶子曾為越王鑄五劍：

  • 湛盧
  • 純鈞
  • 勝邪
  • 魚腸
  • 巨闕

后因風鬍子之邀，與幹將赴楚，為楚王鑄龍淵、泰阿、工布三劍。 每一劍都是赫赫有名的名劍。其徒弟幹將和女兒莫邪為夫妻，他們合鑄了著名的幹將（雄）莫邪（雌）雙劍的雌雄劍。

吳王夫差矛
越王勾踐劍
七星龍淵劍/七星劍/龍泉劍 (歐冶子+幹將)
泰阿/太阿 (歐冶子+幹將)
entry.summary: 中國名劍

entry.title: Why businesses exist in clusters
entry.content:
Why do competitors open their stores next to one another? - Jac de Haan - YouTube

Even distribution, the socially optimal solution, is not a Nash equilibrium. One side can cheat and move towards the others territory to gain advantage. So participants cluster together, back to back, around the equilibrium point.
entry.summary: Why do competitors open their stores next to one ano

entry.title: Wine Tasting
entry.content:
【品酒小知識】五個品酒術語，輕鬆享受品酒趣
【品酒小知識】你因為澀味而討厭紅酒？

  • Body (厚薄)
    Light <> Full/Think
    viscosity vs water
  • Fruit
    identify the flavor
    usually associate with some fruit
  • Tannin
  • Acidity
  • Sweetness
    Dry <> Sweet

Aging: Tenning+, Acid+, Thickness+
Cholesterol in wine?
entry.summary: 【品酒小知識】五個品酒術語，輕鬆享受品酒趣
